metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38406 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: bgpd/bgp_flowspec.c in FRRouting (FRR) before 8.4.3 mishandles an nlri length of zero, aka a "flowspec overflow."

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
